events.name: click
events.doc: Fires when a template node is clicked.

events.doc: Fires when a click occurs and it is not on a template node.

events.doc: Fires when a right click occurs that is not on a template node.

events.doc: Fires after the component is destroyed.

events.doc: Fires after the component is moved.

events.doc: Fires when a component is removed from an CQ.Ext.Container

events.doc: Fires after the component markup is rendered.
